pageContext.claim: “And, you know, it's become a tremendous job producer. And it's great to be independent. We're independent. Our energy is now independent. We produce more oil than -- oil and gas than anybody else, than any other country.”
pageContext.analysis: The United States is not energy-independent; it continues to import millions of barrels of oil per day, including from Persian Gulf countries and Russia. Trump often takes credit for an energy boom that began under the Obama administration.
